posts.subject: Block auto download of illegal thumbnails?
posts.body: In my opinion the auto downloading of illegal thumbnails (expecially cp) Is Very Dangerous and dont allow a "legal" use of this zite. Maybe to prevent this can be a good idea to enable the option "Always spoiler" by default? I tried to fork millchan by me but in not an Expert and failed for now...What do you think?

Actually uploading vids dont working in my fork. Im using the last version of millchan source code taken from gitgud and the last version of ffmpeg.js compiled from sources. How can i fix this?

Edit i fixed the problem recreating the site on a new URL 

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1FruQqMYzXQZ2PHuYrvaoZT2H9fbkAYqBR
